definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: shout or blast of war, alarm, or joy;—´[[ת]]: Le 23:24 +; cstr. [[תְּרוּעַת]] Je 4:19 +;—

alarm of war, war-cry, Jos 6:5, Jos 6:20, Je 20:16, Ez Eze 21:27, Am 1:14, Am 2:2, Zep 1:16, Job 39:25; [[מִלְחָמָה]] ´[[ת]]: Je 4:19, Je 49:2; [[מֶלָח]] ´[[ת]]: battle-cry of king Nu 23:21 (poem in JE).

blast  for march: ´[[תקע ת]]: Nu 10:5, Nu 10:6, Nu 10:6 (P; with [[חֲחׂחְרוֹת]]; hence) ´[[חֲחׂחְרוֹת הַתּ]]: Nu 31:6 (P) 2Ch 13:12; on day of atonement ´[[שׁוֹפַר ת]]: Le 25:9 (H); 1st of mo. ´[[זִכְרוֹן ת]]: Le 23:24 (P; [[בַּחׂדֶשׁ הַשְּׁבִיעִי כְּאֶחָד לַחׂדֶשׁ]]), [[יוֹם תׂ]] Nu 29:1 (P); gen. ´[[חִלְחְלֵי ת]]: Ps 150:5.

shout of joy with religious impulse, 1Sa 4:5, 1Sa 4:6, 1Sa 4:6, 2Sa 6:15 = 1Ch 15:28, 2Ch 15:14, Ezr 3:11, Ezr 3:12, Ezr 3:13; [[הַשִּׂמְחָה]] ´[[קוֹל ת]]: Ezr 3:13; in public worship gen. Job 33:26; esp. + musical service Ps 33:3, Ps 47:6; ´[[זִבְחֵי ת]]: Ps 27:6, ´[[יׁדְעֵי ת]]: Ps 89:16.
shout of joy, in gen. Job 8:21 (‖[[שְׂחַוֹק ]]).
